subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: O.J. Mayo and Michael Beasley showed why they are among the best freshmen in the country, but Beasley had more help in a 80 — 67 Kansas State victory.
snippet: O.J. Mayo and Michael Beasley showed why they are among the best freshmen in the country, but Beasley had more help in a 80 — 67 Kansas State victory.
